# # Error


```php
use Xendit\Customer\Error;
```

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Examples |
|------------|:-------------:|:-------------:|-------------|:-------------:|
| **error_code** | **string** | ☑️ |  | SERVER_ERROR |
| **message** | **string** | ☑️ |  | Something unexpected happened, we are investigating this issue right now |
| **errors** | **object[]** |  |  | null |
